publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2644 Mr Frank McAveety: The Children's Hearings (Legal Representation) (Scotland) Rules 2001-That the Education, Culture and Sport Committee recommends that nothing further be done under the Children's Hearings (Legal Representation) (Scotland) Rules 2001 (SSI 2001/478). Supported by: Jackie Baillie*

S1M-2644 Mr Frank McAveety: The Children's Hearings (Legal Representation) (Scotland) Rules 2001-That the Education, Culture and Sport Committee recommends that nothing further be done under the Children's Hearings (Legal Representation) (Scotland) Rules 2001 (SSI 2001/478). Supported by: Jackie Baillie
